scripts.deploy: rm -r ../BangleApps/apps/advcasio; cp -r ./bangle-app-for-store ../BangleApps/apps/advcasio; cp -r ./bangle-app-for-store/README.md ./README.md; rm -r ./docs; cp -r ./web-app/client/ ./docs/; git add .; git commit -m 'up'; git push github master; git subtree push --prefix web-app heroku master;
